name: Apocrypha Obscura -Transmissions from the Dreaming Gynoid
name_original: Apocrypha Obscura -Transmissions from the Dreaming Gynoid
description:
Weird fantasy, weird space, venture seeds, and the weird sisters of Dagger 9mm!   A compilation from the first years of the Dreaming Gynoid blog. Compiled from five years worth of articles, posts, and missives, many no longer available,  All fully compatible with the DCC RPG! 

Do note that most of this material has been previously published, often in a somewhat different form, on the Dreaming Gynoid blog from 2018 to the present.  Some material also appeared prior on the  “Swords of Jaldipoor,” “I Shoot Him in the Face!”  and “Lens of Unrectified Night” Blogs, from 2015-2018.  
All of it has been written and edited by Gwendolyn Harper.
